entry.title: $2.1 Billion in Bitcoin Seized in German Piracy Sting
entry.summary: An international law enforcement operation recovered 50,000 BTC from piracy website operators.

entry.title: Gas-Free Ethereum Games? Animoca Brands and Layer-2 LightLink Team Up
entry.summary: The Sandbox and Anichess publisher Animoca Brands aims to bring LightLink’s gasless tech into its Ethereum games.

entry.title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin Says AI Can Be Like "A Player in a Game" for Crypto
entry.summary: Vitalik Buterin explores four ways AI can benefit the blockchain, some of which he says are more risky than others.

entry.title: 'GameStop' Meme Coin on Solana Pumps 330% as Gaming Giant Bails on NFTs
entry.summary: GameStop might be getting out of the crypto world, but a new unofficial GME token on Solana is white hot right now.

entry.title: $675 Million Recovered From $2.6 Billion Stolen in 2023 Crypto Hacks: PeckShield
entry.summary: The total amount of crypto stolen through illicit means dropped from $3.6 billion in 2022 to $2.6 billion in 2023, the blockchain security firm found.

entry.title: OpenAI Counters ‘Laziness’ Complaints with ChatGPT Upgrade, API Price Cuts
entry.summary: The leading generative AI platform hopes its agent will act less like a stubborn intern and more like an efficient robot that’s happy to do (almost) everything you want.

entry.title: Floki Halts Staking Program in Hong Kong After Regulator Warning
entry.summary: The Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission last week flagged Floki's staking programs as "suspicious investment products."

entry.title: Bitcoin Gains 3%, Solana Up 6.9% Ahead of Jupiter Airdrops
entry.summary: Bitcoin gained 3% overnight as investors look ahead to the U.S. Federal Reserve's announcement on interest rates Wednesday.

entry.title: A Neuralink Chip Has Been Implanted In a Human for the First Time
entry.summary: Elon Musk said the patient is recovering well, and that initial results are "promising."

entry.title: DOJ Charges Three People in $1.9 Billion Crypto Scam
entry.summary: The trio faces up to five years in federal prison if convicted of the scheme.

entry.title: Binance Pours Cold Water on NFT Game That Pulled In $115 Million for Its Mint
entry.summary: SkyArk Chronicles just had a huge NFT mint, but Binance Labs now says the game developer misrepresented its investment.

entry.title: Hallucination Nation: How Crazy Is Your Favorite AI Model?
entry.summary: Huggingface’s new Hallucinations Leaderboard ranks models based on how prone they are to generate content that is not true.

entry.title: Ethereum Layer-2 Immutable zkEVM Launches—Here's When Games Are Coming
entry.summary: The Immutable zkEVM mainnet is now live in early access, with select games set to launch in the coming months on the Ethereum scaler.

entry.title: Solana Traders Send WEN on Wild Ride After $35 Million in Tokens Burned
entry.summary: WEN plunged 23% Monday after ending its airdrop campaign. Solana traders left $35 million worth of the meme coin on the table.

entry.title: Billionaire Biohacker Gets Into NFTs with Drip Solana Airdrop
entry.summary: The Blueprint collection, in collaboration with SuperTeamDAO, offers three free and random Bryan Johnson-themed collectibles.

entry.title: There's a New Bitcoin ETF Offering 30% Yield: Here's How It Works
entry.summary: Though it doesn't offer direct Bitcoin exposure, the new product uses BTC to generate a purported 30% yield for investors.

entry.title: Bitcoin Pumps as Market Awaits Fed Rate Verdict
entry.summary: Traders have already priced in Wednesday’s Fed committee meeting. But a signal that interest rates will drop in March could see the asset go up further.

entry.title: Solana Flips Ethereum in DeFi Trading as Jupiter Airdrop Nears
entry.summary: Ethereum is under threat again from Solana following December’s meme coin barrage, with JUP dropping soon.

entry.title: Bitcoin Funds Lose $480 Million in a Week, But Grayscale Withdrawals Slowing
entry.summary: Good news is that "outflows are beginning to subside" from Grayscale, says CoinShares.

entry.title: Solana's 'MixMob' Game Sets MXM Token Launch, First Airdrop Details
entry.summary: MixMob is launching its MXM governance token this week, with . Here’s what to expect from the Solana game’s airdrop.

entry.title: WEN Airdrop: 41% of Solana Meme Coin Still Unclaimed as Deadline Looms
entry.summary: With hours left to go, about 60% of available WEN tokens—a new Solana meme coin—have been claimed by eligible wallets.

entry.title: This Week On Crypto Twitter: Twitter Payments Rumors, Donald Trump Fuels Meme Coin Rise
entry.summary: Will the real Donald Trump meme coin please stand up? Never mind. All of you, sit down.

entry.title: What Is Ronin? The Ethereum Gaming Chain Behind 'Axie Infinity' and 'Pixels'
entry.summary: Ronin is an Ethereum sidechain network designed for gaming, with a growing roster of crypto and NFT experiences. Here's what you need to know.

entry.title: Bitcoin Ordinals Inscription Marks First Individual Poem Sale by Sotheby's
entry.summary: Inscribed using Bitcoin Ordinals, Ana Maria Caballero's poem "Cord" fetched over $11,000 at auction. She speaks to SCENE about the moment.

entry.title: Biggest Video Games Releasing in February 2024
entry.summary: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth and Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League headline a busier month for major gaming debuts.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Dip, Bitcoin Recovers
entry.summary: On Monday, several digital assets saw a precipitous drop. Most worked their way back to flat.

entry.title: Power Naps Can Keep Your Brain from Shrinking: Study
entry.summary: UK Biobank data reveals daytime napping may be essential to improved reaction time and memory in middle-aged adults.

entry.title: Someone Recreated 'Diablo III' in NFT Game 'Nifty Island' Amid Airdrop Campaign
entry.summary: A passionate Diablo fan created an expansive game modeled after the popular franchise within Nifty Island, a buzzy new NFT game.

entry.title: WEN Airdrop Sparks Frenzy as Solana Meme Coin Targets a Million Wallets
entry.summary: Solana held steady during the WEN meme coin drop, although the chaos around the launch caused some wild price spikes.

entry.title: Game On: The Hottest Upcoming Gaming Token Airdrops
entry.summary: UPDATED: The latest on a wide array of upcoming gaming airdrops, including for Pixels, MixMob, Portal, Saga Protocol, and beyond.

entry.title: Bitcoin Will Crash—and Hard, Says This Crypto VC
entry.summary: The price of the biggest cryptocurrency could drop as low as $25,000, says ARK Invest’s ex-crypto lead.

entry.title: How a Perfume DAO Crafted a 'Scent of the Metaverse'
entry.summary: Rook Perfumes founder Nadeem Crowe and Melissa Gilmour of Web3 creative agency Lily & Piper join Stephen Graves to talk about how they created a fragrance with a DAO and brought it to the shelves of London department store Harvey Nichols.

entry.title: Trash-Fueled BTC Mining w/ Chris Bennet
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Chris Bennet from Spacestation Investments.
They discuss: - Mining BTC with energy generated from landfills - How to increase deal-flow - Running an agency vs running a fund

entry.title: Preview of Agoria's 'Le Code d’Orsay'
entry.summary: A first look at "Sigma Lumina," a sculpture by artist and musician Agoria in collaboration with Johan Lescure. It features in "Le Code d’Orsay," the first NFT exhibition at the Musée d’Orsay.

entry.title: Are you the one being farmed? w/ Frisson
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Frisson from Tallyx.xyz
They reflect on: - building in the bear market - the points system meta - will zoomers care about decentralization

entry.title: 'Look Touch Own': OONA Discusses Her Performance Art Exhibition
entry.summary: Conceptual artist OONA joins moderator Raina Marie to discuss "Look Touch Own," her performance art exhibition featuring her own former breast implants, which have been tokenized. This conversation was recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Genius Marketing by Genius Marketers: How Crypto Builders Can Reach the Masses
entry.summary: Rug Radio founder Farokh Sarmad moderates a conversation between 9dcc founder and CEO Gmoney and Serotonin founder and CEO Amanda Cassatt about the challenges and opportunities in Web3 marketing and how they're navigating the ever-evolving space. Recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Generative Art Across Mediums: Artists Discuss the Evolving Space
entry.summary: In this panel discussion from Rug Radio's R Haus at Art Basel Miami 2023, Sofia Garcia, Ismail Tazi, Emily Edelman, and Aleksandra Art discuss the expanding generative art space—and why "generative" doesn't necessarily have to mean digital.

entry.title: The AI Coin to Rule Them All with Mike Grantis
entry.summary: Reza is joined by Mike Grantis from Contango Digital to discuss - The AI coin to rule them all - The Solana Ecosystem - What's next for Solana airdrops

entry.title: Conversation With Snowfro: Bringing 'Chromie Squiggle' #8107 to the Physical Space
entry.summary: Art Blocks founder and CEO and "Chromie Squiggle" project creator Erick "snowfro" Calderon spoke with Benny Redbeard Gross at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel 2023, to discuss how and why "Chromie Squiggle" NFT #8107 was given a special edition print run in collaboration with Avant Arte.

entry.title: Don't Underestimate Mobile Gaming: Qualcomm's Matthew Grossman
entry.summary: Qualcomm product marketing manager Matthew Grossman tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin why mobile esports is exploding in popularity around the world—and dispels some of the misconceptions around mobile gaming.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF: This Is the 'Calm Before the Storm', Says ETF Analyst
entry.summary: Bloomberg Senior ETF Analyst Eric Balchunas joins Farokh Sarmad, Michael Anderson, and Ovie Faruq on the FOMO Hour to share the latest intel on the looming approval for a spot Bitcoin ETF, what might happen when the very different worlds of TradFi and crypto collide, and his insights on “Genslish,” the unique and strategic language of SEC chair Gary Gensler.

entry.title: Losing 1500 BTC on Mt Gox and the Problem with Women in Web3
entry.summary:
This week our host is joined by Brooke Lacey!
They discuss: - Making and losing generational wealth - Trauma Bond - Women in Web3 - The Problem with WAGMI
